pr_title: [#2267] Add implementation of Telemetry and EventSender

timeline.message:
[#2267] Add implementation of Telemetry and EventSender

The implementation reuses the existing vertx-proton based
implementations but replaces the existing factories.


Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText: The forRemoval param is Java 1.9 API, however the hono-core pom defines Java 1.8 to be used, so this gets marked as an error here. (Also in two more places in this class.)
timeline.author: calohmn
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1093,7 +1181,9 @@ public static Message newMessage(
      * @return The message with its properties set.
      * @throws NullPointerException if message or adapterTypeName are {@code null}.
      * @throws IllegalArgumentException if target is {@code null} and the message does not have an address set.
+     * @deprecated Use {@link #addProperties(Message, ResourceIdentifier, TenantObject, Map, Map, boolean, boolean)} instead.
      */
+    @Deprecated(forRemoval = true)

timeline.bodyText: Map.of and timeToLive.toSeconds() are Java 1.9 API (see above).
timeline.author: calohmn

replies.bodyText: That is true. I wonder why the animal sniffer plugin doesn't detect this during the build ...
replies.author: sophokles73

replies.bodyText: Looks like version 1.18 of the sniffer plugin does not work, after upgrading to 1.19 the problems are detected by the build ...
replies.author: sophokles73

timeline.bodyText: Map.of and timeToLive.toSeconds() are Java 1.9 API (see above).
timeline.author: calohmn

timeline.bodyText: The timeToLive parameter isn't used anymore.
timeline.author: calohmn
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -953,9 +956,26 @@ public static Message newMessage(
             final Duration timeToLive,

timeline.message:
Do not use Java 9 API

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>
